author: alita85
content: heads up that the bot now supports asset file editing (if a eip file is valid to be auto-merged then so too is it valid for making any changes to its respective files) and other file over-writing via editor approval (any editor); I also made changes that allows authors to move their eips to withdrawn without editor approval; finally, final eips now mention authors first and once the author approves it'll mention editors. I also included a bunch of changes for things like better error handling (which will hopefully make feedback easier to understand) and some other dev-level stuff.
